source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a shot framing a woman from her head to her shoulders, positioned in the bottom center of the frame against a vast blue sky that serves as the background. The camera then tilts downward, revealing her entire upper body and establishing her as a giant figure standing in the middle ground amidst rolling, dry hills that enter the frame from the bottom. In the final composition, the woman remains centrally located, while the foreground at the bottom of the frame is populated with miniature elements, including a swing set on the bottom left, a car with balloons on the bottom right, and tiny figures scattered across the landscape. The camera is positioned at the woman's level throughout the shot.
